forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: A slight chance of showers and thunderstorms. Partly cloudy, with a low around 63. North northeast wind around 3 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%.

forecast.name: Wednesday
forecast.detailedForecast: A slight chance of showers and thunderstorms. Mostly sunny. High near 86, with temperatures falling to around 83 in the afternoon. East wind 3 to 9 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.

nubsNob.comments: Thank you for making 2024-25 another great season! Stay tuned for updates, we look forward to having you back next year.
